Explore London with our eco-friendly cycling tours

Re-cycle - A different tour of London

The best way to see London is to ride your bike through the city, and do it in a 100% carbon free way. We provide comfortable new bikes for you to use and take you around the area of London you would like to visit. We take breaks and how you great spots where you can indulge on some good food and drinks. On the tours there will not be more then 10 people, so that it will be easy to keep together and you can get to know eachother.

This way of travelling will open your eyes to a different kind of exploring. Travel with a good conscience and enjoy seeing the citys hidden gems with a great group of people. The team had great knowlengde and will answer any questions you may have about London.

About London

It's an european melting pot, with more than 8 million people and a diverse range of cultures. The city is a centre of arts, fashion, entertainment and history. There are so many historic sites in London, its impossible to see it all in one day. The city is heavily traficated and getting around it can take much longer than it has to.

Testimonials

The tour was amazing, we saw so much more then we would have seen on our own, and eco-friendly! The guides were so nice and their knowlengde of the city was great. They also took us to a great lunch spot that had amazing food.
- Elisabeth and David, New York.
